short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share a URL directly from your browser via email

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your current tab URL via Email. Just click in the Send to Mail button or in the context menu. The title of the URL will be the title of the mail. Works with Gmail, Outlook, Thunderbird, ... If you have trouble and the addon doesn't work as expected, please visit chrome://settings/handlers.
